wikitext.*:
'''Capalini''' were most likely the [[fays]] of springs, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Cap>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Capalini'' is in [[Qenya]], probably being related to the word ''[[kapalinda (Qenya word)|kapalinda]]'' ("spring of water"),<ref name=Cap/> with ''kapalinda'' being derived from the root [[KAPA]] ("leap, spring").<ref>{{PE|12}}, entry '''KAPA'''-, p. 45</ref>
